value: How to Configure (Maintenance - Customer case support)
description: Questions focused on guiding users through system settings, parameters, or configuration steps.

value: How to Develop (Maintenance - Customer case support)
description: Instructions or guidance related to small custom developments or enhancements during support.
Requests for references to official documentation, guides, or manuals.
Investigation of errors or unexpected behavior to determine root cause.
Actions or instructions to resolve known or identified issues, including patches or workarounds.
In-depth evaluation or design considerations for new features, requirements, or architectures.
Code-level tasks such as implementing logic, creating extensions, or modifying interfaces.
Any question or task that doesn’t fall into the defined categories above.
